snippet.title: Loot & Looter - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Play here: https://gamejolt.com/games/lootlooter/301835

Hi looter! Welcome to the richest dungeon of the world!

Here you will find the greatest treasure that man have ever seen.
But watch out! The more loot you have, the slower you move!
Now you are ready for the dungeon... Oh I was about to forget it... beware of the deadly skeleton guardians!

Good luck!

Game made in 72h for Ludum Dare 40: "The more you have, the worse it is"

Credits:

All the contents were created during the 72h except for the followings:

-Song “Heavy Interlude” by Kevin MacLeod
-Sound effects by Soundly
-Wall texture by Terry Mosier
-Floor texture by Jimmy Malachier
-Ceiling texture by Raphaella Nightfire
-Stubborn Shark font by Greg Medina
